overview:
Jamie is the founder of Book’d, an online scheduling service that allows businesses to accept appointment bookings from their customers. Formerly Jamie designed and developed Foliotek, and electronic portfolio system for students.

Jamie led the team that designed and developed Foliotek and he helped guide it to become the leading portfolio assessment tool among colleges and universities. In 2005, Jamie helped start the Center for eResearch at the University of Missouri-Columbia which helped foster cross-disciplinary Internet-related research across the four university system. Jamie has worked in the professional photography industry, designing online fulfillment systems for professional photographers for one of the largest labs in the country. He has also worked with the Reynolds Jounalism Institute at the Missouri School of Journalism to develop online communities that keep journalists, academics, and advertising professionals connected.
